name: Secret Files
long_description: These filenames are all gibberish. It looks like there are some files with .launch and .video extensions.
short_description: Not sure what to make of these cryptic files...

room_features.name: Cat Videos from the Internet
room_features.description: OMG! It's a fat orange cat in a dinosaur custome! He's not even doing anything, just yelling at the camera! Sooo cute!

room_features.name: Nuclear Launch Codes
room_features.description: No use for these. But the Police might be interested...
